channel.title: Posts on Todd Constable
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Todd Constable

item.title: Task-induced brain state manipulation
item.description: Recent work has begun to relate individual differences in brain functional organization to human behaviors and cognition, but the best brain state to reveal such relationships remains an open question.

item.title: Optimal Transport and Brain Imaging
item.description: Fuctional connectomes, derived from functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) is widely used to study functional organization of human brain.
